section.title: Installer
section.para: The easiest way to install Frhed is to download the installer executable from Frhed home page. After downloading the installer file just run it.
The installer asks few questions about the installation:

listitem.para: Program Files - installs program files needed to run Frhed and it cannot be deselected.

section.para: After these questions installation starts by selecting the Install -button.

section.title: Uninstalling
section.para: Frhed has an uninstaller. Uninstaller can be started from Windows Control Panel or from Frhed program group in Start-menu.

section.title: Installing from Archive
section.para: Frhed project releases in addition to installer executable also archive files containing executable files. Frhed can be installed by unzipping files to some proper folder retaining the folder structure. After unzipping the Frhed can be run just starting the executable.
